verses.name: 1 Kings 8:16
verses.text: Since the day that I brought forth my people Israel out of Egypt, I chose no city out of all the tribes of Israel to build an house, that my name might be therein; but I chose David to be over my people Israel.

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:17
verses.text: And it was in the heart of David my father to build an house for the name of the Lord God of Israel.

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:18
verses.text: And the Lord said unto David my father, Whereas it was in thine heart to build an house unto my name, thou didst well that it was in thine heart.
